title: How many semesters do students in CSE really live in hostel for?
content: I am living in hostel and had to ask for how long do people really live in hostel and if they get any free time in hostel?

comments.body:
It really depends on where you permanently reside and what you want out of your non college time!

\> Bangaloreans generally leave hostel in the second/third year

\> If you have a strong friend circle, people generally move out to an apartment together

\> If you don't get the room of your choice, people generally move out

\> 4th year, depending on internship location and commute, people move out

Do you get free time in hostel? I would say yes, honestly post college hours, i had nothing to do in hostel aka free time xD
If you want to 8 if not 0. Depending on what you wanna do. There's no compulsion.
